page.title: 17Religion and Society
page.content: The English Baptist Church comprises 24 members who meet at Maindee Road, Cwmfelinfach.The age range of members is from 40 to 70 years.We have no minister and rely on preachers from other Gwent Churches to lead Sunday Evening Services.Junior Church is held on Sunday mornings and is lead by church members.At this service children of the Sunday school and adult members join in worship.This is a recent inovation and is proving very successful.Videos,film strips and stories are used in these services. Prayer meeting is held on Monday evenings and also Bible Study. Wednesday evening the Sisterhood meet and on Thursday there is youth night when between 30 and 50 local children attend.We try to serve our community in such a way to glorify God.
